items.kid_gloss: A place where gravity is super strong.
items.hook_question: What happens inside a black hole?
items.mini_task: Create a model of a black hole using clay.

items.hook_question: Could we live on an exoplanet?
items.mini_task: Draw your ideal exoplanet and its features.

items.kid_gloss: A big star explosion in space.
items.mini_task: Use glitter and paper to make a supernova.
